mods.abstract: White image on a black background. Amoebae shaped "faces" of, from top to bottom, man, woman and child. The facial features are sparsely drawn; red hair and suggestions of clothing are added. The forms are white, outlined in black, and detailed in red.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
